other_title: アンドロメダ・ストーリーズ (Japanese)
plot: After losing her Home planet before the artificial intelligence driven machines, a female android arrives in an Earth-like civilization, only to find out that it's their next target. Towards the threat, she makes alliance with the charismatic twins that hold the key to the whole planet.
ending_theme: "Eien no Ichi Byou (永遠の一秒; One Second of Eternity)" by Stevany
